phrs.translation: 能干地, 是什么意思

sentences.sentence: It was all dealt with very capably by the police and security people.
sentences.translation: 警方和治安人员极其出色地处理了这一切。

sentences.sentence: Even though he is a cutpurse, sometimes, he will capably be a good man.
sentences.translation: 即便他是一个小偷，有时他也可能是一个“好人”。

sentences.sentence: Morden science and technology has not developed capably enough to make instant food as nutrient as normal food.
sentences.translation: 现代科技还没有达到能够让方便食品达到能象一般食品那么的有营养。
